title: my game is having issues
body:
C:/RiotGames/League of Legends/BugSplat.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error try installing the program again or using the original installisation media contact your system administrator or the software vendor for suppor i get this message every time i try to load league of legends

replies.body: Try uninstalling and then deleting any files left in your directory after doing so. Then try installing it again on another disk partition (instead installing it on C:, install it on D:)
i did the hextec full empty thing and reinstall but it didn't fix anything

Where is this happening exactly, when trying to open the client?  Your installation may not have gone well, so grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a restore to fix up any bad files.  If the issue persists, toss some more info my way to help.   Let me know if it helps.
